Class PlayerModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.app.towerDefense.models.PlayerModel

  • public class PlayerModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    usbaitass Player class that stores the Player information such as sunCurrency, hp, gameWave, player name and his Towers.
